com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary

Class KSTNanoSDK.ScanConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary.KSTNanoSDK.ScanConfiguration
  • Enclosing class:
    KSTNanoSDK

    public static class KSTNanoSDK.ScanConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom class for scan configurations. This class is used when retrieving scan configurations from the Nano and holds all the information the configuration provides. WARNING: This class is used by the Spectrum C library and must not change names or move from the current directory
